And in that day<S>3117</S> seven<S>7651</S> women<S>802</S> shall take hold<S>2388</S> of one<S>259</S> man<S>376</S>, saying<S>559</S>, We will eat<S>398</S> our own bread<S>3899</S>, and wear<S>3847</S> our own apparel<S>8071</S>: only let us be called<S>7121</S> by thy name<S>8034</S>, to take away<S>622</S> our reproach<S>2781</S>. <sup>let: Heb. let thy name be called upon us</sup> <sup>to take: or, take thou away</sup>
In that day<S>3117</S> shall the branch<S>6780</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> be beautiful<S>6643</S> and glorious<S>3519</S>, and the fruit<S>6529</S> of the earth<S>776</S> shall be excellent<S>1347</S> and comely for<S>8597</S> them that are escaped<S>6413</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>. <sup>beautiful: Heb. beauty and glory</sup> <sup>them: Heb. the escaping</sup>
And it shall come to pass, that he that is left<S>7604</S> in Zion<S>6726</S>, and he that remaineth<S>3498</S> in Jerusalem<S>3389</S>, shall be called<S>559</S> holy<S>6918</S>, even every one that is written<S>3789</S> among the living<S>2416</S> in Jerusalem<S>3389</S>: <sup>among: or, to life</sup>
When the Lord<S>136</S> shall have washed away<S>7364</S> the filth<S>6675</S> of the daughters<S>1323</S> of Zion<S>6726</S>, and shall have purged<S>1740</S> the blood<S>1818</S> of Jerusalem<S>3389</S> from the midst<S>7130</S> thereof by the spirit<S>7307</S> of judgment<S>4941</S>, and by the spirit<S>7307</S> of burning<S>1197</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> will create<S>1254</S> upon every dwelling place<S>4349</S> of mount<S>2022</S> Zion<S>6726</S>, and upon her assemblies<S>4744</S>, a cloud<S>6051</S> and smoke<S>6227</S> by day<S>3119</S>, and the shining<S>5051</S> of a flaming<S>3852</S> fire<S>784</S> by night<S>3915</S>: for upon all the glory<S>3519</S> shall be a defence<S>2646</S>. <sup>upon all: or, above all</sup> <sup>defence: Heb. covering</sup>
And there shall be a tabernacle<S>5521</S> for a shadow<S>6738</S> in the daytime<S>3119</S> from the heat<S>2721</S>, and for a place of refuge<S>4268</S>, and for a covert<S>4563</S> from storm<S>2230</S> and from rain<S>4306</S>.
